About Us

About Yetiş Çorap

Your reliable address for quality sock production and wholesale with over 20 years of experience

Yetiş Çorap

Trusted since 2000

Why Yetiş Çorap?

Yetiş Çorap has been serving in baby and children's sock production and wholesale in Istanbul Giyimkent since 2000.

With our quality production, competitive prices, and customer satisfaction-focused work principles, we are a reliable supplier in the sector.

Quality fabrics

Baby Safe

Health-compliant

Fast Delivery

Flexible orders
